name: Where Villains Spend The Weekend
description:
Welcome to SENSATION CASINO's interactive history booth! Spanning three vignettes documenting the rise of not just SENSATION but the wretched town of EL DORADO itself, step into the shoes of three of EL DORADO- and, possibly, the galaxy's- most prominent figures! Enjoy your stay!

PS. Best played in fullscreen! Also, the names reveal all.
